title: Vigilant
data:
{{obsolete}}
Monsters with the '''vigilant''' flag are less likely to forget about the player.

This flag is only used for [[curse skull]]s.

==History==
*The vigilant flag was removed in [[0.15]].
*Prior to [[0.14]], monsters with the vigilant flag always noticed players, and never forgot about them over time.
*This flag was introduced in [[0.13]], to complement new curse skull behavior.
